dcterms:creator: Salar Basiri
Alireza Taheri
Ali F. Meghdari
Mehrdad Boroushaki
Minoo Alemi
dcterms:description: A dataset containing short-length sentences in Persian Sign Language (PSL) with over 3000 time-series samples from 16 commonly used PSL glosses, collected to evaluate the performance of a sign language recognition system.
dcterms:title: PSL Dataset (for short-length sentences)

dcterms:creator: Salar Basiri
Alireza Taheri
Ali F. Meghdari
Mehrdad Boroushaki
Minoo Alemi
dcterms:description: A dataset containing long-length sentences in Persian Sign Language (PSL) with samples gathered to evaluate the model's ability to recognize longer sentences, consisting of 4 to 8 words.
dcterms:title: PSL Dataset (for long-length sentences)
